project.name: Bread Test
project.description: An extremely simple static HTML page featuring a massive bread emoji centered on a white background

core_features.name: Display Bread Emoji
core_features.description: Show a bread emoji (üçû) that fills the entire screen
acceptance_criteria: Emoji takes up most of the viewport

core_features.name: Center Positioning
core_features.description: The bread emoji must be perfectly centered on the screen

core_features.name: White Background
core_features.description: Pure white background with no other elements

constraints: Must be a single static HTML file

assumptions.assumption: Emoji size should use viewport units (e.g., 50vw) for responsive scaling
assumptions.reasoning: User wants it to 'fill the entire screen' which implies responsive sizing
assumptions.alternative: Could use fixed pixel size but would not be responsive

assumptions.reasoning: Standard naming convention for main HTML file
assumptions.alternative: Could be named bread-test.html to match project name

assumptions.assumption: No page title or metadata needed
assumptions.alternative: Could include minimal metadata for validity
